short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allowing of using ChatGPT in New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Utilizing the innovative ChatGPT Sensei extension, you gain the ability to conveniently access ChatGPT right from your Google Chrome's new tab page. This grants you the freedom to ask any query of your choosing, provided you are logged into your personal ChatGPT account.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "ChatGPT Sensei" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab to ChatGPT provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://chatgptsensei.info/chat/info/TOS and Privacy Policy at https://chatgptsensei.info/chat/info/privacy
